title: SmarAct Inc.
content: With the development and production of market-leading solutions in the field of high-precision positioning, automation and metrology, the SmarAct Group reliably accompanies their customers in achieving their goals. The product portfolio ranges from single positioning stages to complex parallel kinematics, miniature robots, control systems, automated microassembly solutions and measurement technology. SmarAct anticipates challenges with maximum adaptability and complete in-house production.
